name: HSP_BDC_DENIED_DIAGNOSES
description: This table stores the list of diagnoses on the denial.

columns.name: BDC_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the denial or correspondence record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DENIED_DIAGNOSIS
columns.description: A diagnosis that caused this denial.
